text: John Henry "Jack" Kelley (July 10, 1927 - September 15, 2020) was an American ice hockey coach. He was a member of the United States Hockey Hall of Fame. Kelley was the first general manager and head coach of the New England Whalers of the World Hockey Association (WHA). He was head coach at Boston University. He was born in Medford, Massachusetts. Kelley died on September 15, 2020 at the age of 93.The Passing of Legendary Hockey Coach Jack Kelley ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Massachusetts
title: Jack Kelley (ice hockey)
